definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[אַמִּיץ]] ([[אַמִּץ]]) adj. mighty—´[[א]] abs. 2 S 2Sa 15:12 + 2 t.; cstr. Job 9:4 + 2 t.—mighty, of Absa-lom's conspiracy 2Sa 15:12; elsewh. of persons; as subst., instrum. of ´[[י]] (i.e. Assyrians) Is 28:2 (‖[[חזׇק]]; [[לִבּוֹ]] ´[[א]] = valiant, conqueror Am 2:16; of ´[[י]], [[כּׂחַ]] ´[[חֲכַם לֵבָב וְא]] Job 9:4; cf. ´[[כּׂחַ א]] v:Job 9:19 (v. Di & RV), [[כּׂחַ]] ´[[א]] Is 40:26 (‖[[רׂב אוֹנִים]]).
